data.actual_result: The embeds simply load and display in the wrong order, different to the order they were linked in.
data.expected_result: The embedded previews are supposed to be in the correct order, ideally.
data.short_description: When sending multiple embeddable links, the embeds are showing up in the wrong order.
data.steps_to_repro: - Paste a link to an image/video that embeds - Don't send the message- Pase a second link to an image/video that embeds- Send the message
